sections.heading: Overview
content: A specialist in parenting and child behavior, Dr. Anthony E. Wolf received his PhD in Clinical Psychology from the City University of New York and completed his undergraduate work at Columbia College. For more than twenty years, he has been in private practice treating children and adolescents in the Springfield, Massachusetts area.

Dr. Wolf contributes frequently to several parenting magazines including Parents and Family Circle . In addition, he has written a monthly column for Child magazine and has appeared on numerous television shows including Today , The View , CBS This Morning and Donahue . He is a widely sought after lecturer for both parent and professional audiences. Married, Dr. Wolf is the father of two children.
